resources.string:
"Sipdroid è un client SIP open-source per Android Naviga su http://sipdroid.org per ulteriori info
Versione ${VERSION} Il software è stato rilasciato per scopi di test. Copyright (C) 2009 Il progetto Sipdroid Open Source (http://sipdroid.org) Copyright (C) 2008 Hughes Systique Corporation, USA (http://hsc.com) Copyright (C) 2006 Il progetto Open Source Android (http://android.com Copyright (C) 2005 Luca Veltri - Università di Parma - Italia (http://mjsip.org) Questa applicazione fa parte della categoria software libero; è possibile ridistribuirla e / o modificarla secondo i termini del GNU General Public License pubblicato dalla Free Software Foundation; della versione 3 della licenza o (a propria scelta) di una versione successiva. Questo programma è distribuito nella speranza che risulti utile, ma SENZA ALCUNA GARANZIA; e senza nemmeno la garanzia implicita di COMMERCIABILITÀ o IDONEITÀ PER UN PARTICOLARE SCOPO. Vedi la GNU General Public License per maggiori dettagli (http://www.gnu.org/licenses)."

"Verifica che il Wi-Fi funzioni normalmente 1. Verifica che la password del Wi-Fi immessa sia corretta 2. La velocità della rete potrebbe essere lenta 3. I metodi di crittografia WEP ed EAP non sono supportati 4. Verifica che il router sia connesso ad una rete esterna 5. Impossibile collegare ad una rete Wi-Fi pubblica 6. Impossibile connettere ad una rete Wi-FI 5G "
Questo account Facebook è già stato preso
Questo account WeChat è già stato preso
"Dopo la rimozione dell'account, dovrai riaggiungere nuovamente Facebook per loggarti"
"Dopo la rimozione dell'account, dovrai riaggiungere nuovamente WeChat per loggarti"
Impossibile aggiungere la stessa persona due volte
"Troppi pochi dati per questa posizione. Prova selezionandone una differente."
Quanto il led verde lampeggia Air purifier è in attesa di connessione
Se il led verde è fisso, la connessione è occupata. Riavvia il dispositivo.
La concentrazione PM2.5 in %1$s è più alta di %2$dμg/m³
La concentrazione PM2.5 su %1$s è minore di %2$dμg/m³
"L'applicazione ha già ottenuto i seguenti permessi:"
La sessione attuale è scaduta, tocca \"Salva\" per tentare una nuova autorizzazione
La sessione attuale è scaduta, tocca \"OK\" per tentare una nuova autorizzazione
"L'ultima autorizzazione è scaduta, salvare lo stato di autorizzazione del dispositivo?"
Questa applicazione otterrà il controllo dei dispositivi correlati al Mi Account %1$s (%2$s)
Questa applicazione otterrà i seguenti permessi
I nomi possono contenere fino a 10 caratteri
I nomi possono contenere fino a 30 caratteri
Il nome non può essere vuoto
Verifica la connessione alla rete del tuo telefono e riprova
Sembra che l'attuale rete sia instabile, connettiti ad una più stabile
"Assicurati che l'ambiente di rete sia stabile"
Verifica che il Bluetooth funzioni, assicurati che il dispositivo sia attivo e che rientri nel raggio di rilevamento e riprova
Mantieni il Bluetooth attivo e assicurati che il tuo telefono sia vicino al dispositivo

"1. Assicurati che il Bluetooth sia attivo. 2. Verifica che il dispositivo sia nelle vicinanze. 3. Verifica che il dispositivo sia attivo. 4. Assicurati che altre persone non stiano utilizzando il dispositivo. Dopo la verifica, aggiorna la lista."
I dispositivi sono ordinati per potenza del segnale
"Verifica che il Bluetooth funzioni, assicurati che il dispositivo sia attivo e nel raggio d'azione e riprova"
Mantieni il telefono vicino al dispositivo
Il sensore di movimento corporeo ha rilevato qualcuno
Il sensore di movimento corporeo ha rilevato la partenza di qualcuno
I collegamenti per i dispositivi Bluetooth non sono supportati
Questo dispositivo è già stato abbinato da altri
Verifica che il dispositivo ed il telefono siano collegati allo stesso router e riprova.
Impossibile aggiungere, assicurati che la Mi TV o la Mi Box siano aggiornate
Premi qualsiasi pulsante in %d secondo per connettere
Timeout connessione, riavvia la telecamera e riprova
Il codice immesso non è corretto
Immettere le 4 cifre ascoltate dalla pronuncia vocale
Assicurati che il codice QR si trovi a circa una metro di distanza dal telefono
Perchè non posso ascoltare la pronuncia?
1, Si è verificato un errore, prova a premere a lungo con l'ago per reimpostare nuovamente
2. Scansionare il codice QR per la connessione potrebbe non essere supportato. Prova ad aggiungere nuovamente dopo il ripristino e seleziona un altro metodo di connessione
1. Inserire il perno nel foro sul retro della fotocamera fino a quando la luce LED non diventerà gialla
"2. Attendere finché la luce gialla non lampeggierà e tocca 'OK'"
Assicurati che il codice QR si trovi a circa un metro di distanza dal telefono
Scansiona il codice QR sul telefono per trasferire le informazioni di rete alla telecamera
Se la luce blu è fissa o lampeggiante, la connessione è occupata. Riavvia il dispositivo.
La webcam sarà pronta per connettersi quando la luce rossa passerà da fissa a lampeggiante
Collegare il dispositivo e seguire il manuale per operare
Collegare il dispositivo e seguire il manuale per operare
Scegli la rete a cui desideri connetterti
Scansiona il codice QR con la fotocamera
La rete wireless 5Ghz è supportata su questo dispositivo

Il codice di verifica non è corretto
I collegamenti non sono supportati su questo dispositivo
Impossibile scaricare il pacchetto JS. Ti sei dimenticato di avviare il server di sviluppo o di collegare il tuo dispositivo?

Foto del profilo cambiata con successo
Passa ad uno stesso account di Mi Home per autorizzare
Ad esempio: accendi la luce della camera da letto
Fai qualcosa se le condizioni sono soddisfatte
Ordina per intensità del segnale Bluetooth
Inserisci il nome del dispositivo da aggiungere
Seleziona un gateway per aggiungere dispositivi
Seleziona i dispositivi usati di frequente
Non è possibile selezionare più di 6 articoli
Attiva il Wi-Fi per rendere i dati più accurati. Attivare ora?
Sposta in basso di una posizione
Sposta in alto di una posizione
Selezionare i codec audio disponibili per le chiamate vocali
Tenere premuto il tasto Ordina per riordinare gli oggetti
Visita facebook.com/device ed immetti il codice mostrato.
"Errore imprevisto durante il download di un'immagine."
L'accesso a WebView richiede l'autorizzazione INTERNET
"Per connettere il tuo account, apri l'app Facebook sul tuo dispositivo mobile e controlla le notifiche."
Hai tutto sotto controllo - scegli quali informazioni vuoi condividere con le app.
"Accendi le luci, AC, purificatore d'aria e altri dispositivi"
Puoi valutare questa app se ti piace. Grazie per il tuo sostegno!
Il 90% degli utenti ha aggiunto questi dispositivi a quelli usati di frequente
%1$s richiede uno o più servizi Google Play che non sono attualmente disponibili. Si prega di contattare lo sviluppatore per assistenza.
%1$s non funzionerà se non abiliti i servizi di Google Play.
%1$s non funzionerà senza i servizi Google Play, che non sono presenti nel telefono.
%1$s non funzionerà senza i servizi Google Play, che non sono presenti nel tuo tablet.
L'account specificato non esiste su questo dispositivo. Si prega di scegliere un altro account.
È necessaria una connessione dati per connettersi ai servizi di Google Play.
Errore nei servizi di Google Play
L'accesso agli account da un profilo limitato non è supportato.
Errore durante la registrazione nell'account specificato. Si prega di scegliere un altro account.
%1$s sta avendo problemi con i servizi di Google Play. Se il problema persiste, contatta lo sviluppatore per assistenza.
%1$s si affida ai servizi di Google Play, che non sono supportati dal tuo dispositivo. Contattare il produttore per assistenza.
%1$s non verrà eseguito se non aggiorni i servizi di Google Play.
%1$s non funzionerà senza i servizi Google Play, che sono attualmente in fase di aggiornamento.
I servizi di Google Play si stanno aggiornando
È necessaria una nuova versione dei servizi di Google Play. Si aggiorneranno a breve.
Già aggiunto ai dispositivi usati di frequente
%1$s rimosso dai dispositivi usati di frequente
Seleziona almeno 1 dispositivo separatamente per le condizioni e le azioni
Scansiona il codice a barre sul pacchetto per aggiungere prodotti. Al momento sono supportati solo spazzolini da denti, asciugamani e altre necessità quotidiane.
Ci scusiamo per l'inconveniente, vuoi caricare questo bug report per aiutarci ad analizzare questo problema?
L'applicazione è stata ripristinata per arresto anomalo
Può verificarsi un errore dopo aver creato ed eseguito questo scenario
Rimuovi fino a 20 dispositivi alla volta
Elimina il periodo di tempo precedente e aggiungilo nuovamente

"Il dispositivo non è supportato sulla versione corrente. Aggiorna l'app alla versione più recente."
Dispositivo offline, si prega di verificare

"1. Assicurarsi che il dispositivo sia attivo. 2. Assicurarsi che il router sia in grado di connettersi ad una rete Internet esterna. 3. Scollegare il dispositivo e riavviarlo. 4. Se hai cambiato la password del router, prova a #start#reset#end# il dispositivo. Dopo aver verificato tutto, aggiorna l'elenco dei dispositivi."
Aggiorna e torna all'elenco dei dispositivi
Il dispositivo è offline, controlla lo stato corrente della connessione
Il nome del dispositivo non può contenere caratteri speciali o segni di punteggiatura
Provincia, città e regione non possono essere vuoti
Il nome non può essere vuoto

"Poiché la maggior parte dei nostri prodotti sono grandi elettrodomestici, la gamma di consegna può essere limitata dalle società di logistica. Nel caso in cui non saremo in grado di consegnare un prodotto, il nostro servizio clienti ti contatterà e provvederà al rimborso."
Sarai in grado di abbinare il dispositivo dopo che l'altra persona l'avrà sbloccato e reimpostato
Dispositivi che supportano il controllo vocale
L'avvio dell'applicazione Mi Home è vietato e le seguenti funzionalità potrebbero non funzionare:
" - Scorciatoia per la tonalità di notifica"
" - Rileva \"Lascia/torna a casa\" per telefono Wi-Fi"
"Avviare l'app Mi Home quando il dispositivo è acceso?"

Sipdroid non è attualmente impostato come telefono predefinito. Ti piacerebbe renderlo il telefono predefinito? Se risponderai "No" qui, potrai ancora chiamare con Sipdroid dal sistema aggiungendo "+" dietro un numero nel Compositore, o selezionando "a testo" in Contatti.
Ti piacerebbe vedere un messaggio di Pascal che introduce Sipdroid 1.5?
Vuoi cambiare la porta SIP da 5060 a 5061 per una maggiore affidabilità?
Download degli ultimi aggiornamenti. Aggiorna ora?
Puoi creare un gruppo per le lampade Yeelight
La versione attuale di Mi Home è troppo vecchia, forse non potrai utilizzare normalmente alcune funzionalità. Aggiorna alla versione più recente per ottenere una maggiore affidabilità.
La versione %s di Mi Home è disponibile, aggiornare ora?"
Hai bisogno di più di 1 dispositivo per creare un gruppo
Le modifiche non salvate andranno perse, uscire ora?
Verifica la rete corrente e connettiti nuovamente
La password può contenere fino a 64 caratteri
Il nome può contenere fino a 32 caratteri

"Prima di iniziare ad utilizzare Mi Home, devi accettare il nostro #start#Accordo utente#end#. L'app richiede un accesso ad Internet, servizi di localizzazione, Bluetooth, dati mobili, microfoni, contatti e messaggi per funzionare normalmente."
Si prega di inserire l'indirizzo del destinatario chiamato come nome@dominio.com

"In the event of any of the following circumstances, Mi Home won't assume any legal liabilities 1. Anyone creating automation tasks in any way will be regarded as having voluntarily accepted this disclaimer. 2. This function is still in a pilot phase and is provided only for the purposes of experience and communication. Any problems that may arise in use of the app will gradually be corrected in the updated versions. 3. If automation tasks fail to run or run improperly due to reasons including, but not limited to, attacks by hackers, network disconnections, network delays or devices going offline, we won't assume any responsibilities but will try our best to reduce losses or consequences for the users caused as a result. 4. In the case of any losses incurred by improper use, we will not assume any legal liability.
"
"Warning: Don't link with devices having potential security risks, since network error or other problems may cause automation failure."
"Couldn't check in due to server problems"
"Couldn't check in, check your network connection"
The device is busy when the blue light is steady. Reset the device (learn how).
Sign in again after you switch locales
"1. Make sure if you've paired the device before."
"You've signed in with a local United States server currently. Make sure if your device is connected to a United States (Singapore server) when you can't find it."
2. How to find the device back?
Sign out and tap the bottom button to switch to the United States (Singapore server). Sign in with the old server to view paired devices.
"3. What's the difference between the new server and the old one?"
"New server: the United States (the United States server). It's our new server located in the United States which allows us to improve access speed and supply more services;"
"Old server: the United States (Singapore server). It's recommended to pair your device with the new one that with better performance."
"1.The United States server is provided now to improve the access speed and supply more services. It's recommended to switch to the United States (the United States server)."
"2. You can't transfer data between the new server and the old one. If you still want to use the device paired before in the new server, you must follow the steps below."
Sign out and sign in again after you switch to the United States (the United States server);
Pair the device again after you reset it.

Xiaomi Communication Technology Co., Ltd. (\"Xiaomi\" or \"we\") will always respect and strictly protect the legitimate rights and interests of our users while they are using our products.
This product includes but is not limited to Mi Home software and related hardware items which are all developed by Xiaomi.The related intellectual property rights (including all copyright, patent rights and trademark rights, etc.) belong to Xiaomi.
This Agreement (including the Privacy Policy) is the final, complete and exclusive agreement related to the products (including natural persons, legal persons or other organizations, hereinafter referred to as the \"user\" or \"you\" who have obtained the products through legal means). In addition, this Agreement will supersede the discussions and agreements among the above-mentioned relevant parties.
This Agreement is legally binding to product users. You therefore fully agree with the terms and conditions of this Agreement. New users of this product will be deemed as having accepted this Agreement. Please read carefully all the terms and conditions of this Agreement, including the exclusion and limitation clauses relevant to both Xiaomi and the users (minors must be accompanied by a parent or adult guardian while reading the Agreement). If you cannot accept all the terms and conditions of this Agreement, do not start using this product. (If you have already purchased the hardware products, but do not accept all the terms and conditions of this Agreement, go to http://www.mi.com learn about the return policy.)
"" "" The user may use the products without creating an account. If you want to use all the features of the products, you need to create a Mi Account and sign in to it. Personal information should be provided while creating the account. You must promise and guarantee that: 1.1.1 All the registration information you provide is truthful and accurate. 1.1.2 Your act in accordance with the law while using the products. 1.1.3 You can terminate and delete your Mi Account at any time. According to the provisions of article 5 of this agreement, your account will be retained or terminated. You must promise to keep your login information confidential and unavailable to other individuals. In addition, you will be responsible for all your actions when using this account. You must inform us of any illegal behavior, unauthorized use or suspected unauthorized behavior. This product will not be held liable for any loss caused by your failure to comply with the above requirements. 1.2 Speed boost and troubleshooting services. In some situations the product will test network access in case you grant it the permission to do so. This is designed to help you speed up the network connection and implement troubleshooting services when necessary. Relevant tests are performed by a software program, and aren’t monitored by humans. This software program is designed to analyze and adapt third-party content or webpages you are opening. We promise to keep the details regarding your use of this product confidential.
2. End user agreement 2.1 Permissions According to the provisions of this agreement, this product will grant you the following nontransferable, non-exclusive licenses: 2.1.1 The right to use this product. 2.1.2 The right to download, install and use this product on your network communication equipment, computers, and mobile communication devices. 2.2 Restrictive clauses You will be subject to the following restrictions: 2.2.1 You should not use this product for selling, leasing, transferring, distribution, or other commercial purposes. 2.2.2 Unless prohibited by law from such restrictions, you may not modify, translate, adapt, merge, utilize, dismantle, reconstruct, reverse compile or reverse engineer any part of this product or its derivatives. 2.2.3 You may not use the product for creating similar or competitive products and services. 2.2.4 Unless explicitly ruled by law, you may not manufacture, copy, distribute, sell, download, or display the product or any part of this product. 2.2.5 You may not remove or destroy any copyright statement or ownership tag contained in this product. 2.3 Ownership rights 2.3.1 Xiaomi will allow you to use and download this product. 2.3.2 Xiaomi (as well as its \"representatives\", if any) owns all the relevant intellectual property rights to this product.
2.4 Fees You must pay for the products, personal Internet access (including but not limited to fees charged by the Internet service providers), content, and other related items. In terms of telecommunication value-added services, we recommend that you confirm the relevant costs with a value-added service provider. 2.5 Any updates or future versions of this product, and any updates or other changes will be subject to the provisions of this Agreement.
3. User content 3.1 User content 3.1.1 User content refers to the content created when downloading, publishing, or using this product in other ways (e.g., information, images, music, or other content). 3.1.2 You are the only person in charge of your content. You will bear the risk of you and any third party being identified as a result of user information disclosure. 3.1.3 You have agreed that your user content is limited by article 4.
3.2 Feedback 3.2.1 The suggestions you offer to Xiaomi (also referred to as \"feedback\") shall be deemed as a transfer of all rights of the feedback and you agree that Xiaomi has the right to use this feedback or any related information in a reasonable manner. We will treat this information as non-confidential and non-proprietary; 3.2.2 You have agreed that you will not offer any information to Xiaomi that will be considered as confidential and proprietary. 3.3 We reserve the rights of users to share (but not be obliged to share) content based on our judgement.n Whether we inform you or not, we have the right to delete the content shared by our users at any time and for any reason. According to article 5, we have the right to retain or terminate your account.
4. Limitation of rights 4.1 You have agreed to use the related services of this product. During the process, you will be held fully liable for the risks incurred by the following actions: 4.1.1 Breaking the principles set by the Constitution. 4.1.2 Jeopardizing state security, divulging state secrets, subverting state power, and undermining national unity. 4.1.3 Causing damage to the nation's honor and interests. 4.1.4 Inciting ethnic hatred, ethnic discrimination, and undermining national unity. 4.1.5 Undermining the country's religious policy, promoting cults and feudal superstitions. 4.1.6 Spreading rumors, disturbing social order, and undermining social stability. 4.1.7 Promoting obscenities, pornography, gambling, violence, murder, terrorism, or abetting crime. 4.1.8 Insulting or slandering others, or infringing upon the lawful rights and interests of others. 4.1.9 Storing other content that is prohibited by laws and administrative rules and regulations. 4.2 You have agreed to refrain from carrying out the following actions:n 4.2.1 Release or share computer viruses, worms, malicious code, or software that deliberately vandalizes, destroys or changes the computer system's software or data. 4.2.2 Collect the information or data of users without their authorization or consent (e.g., email addresses, etc.). 4.2.3 Use this product maliciously in an automated way with the aim of putting an excessive burden on the server, interfering with or damaging the web server and networks in other ways. 4.2.4 Attempt to access the product server data or communication channels without permission.n 4.2.5 Interfering or undermining other users when using the product.
5. Modification and termination 5.1 Modification 5.1.1 Changes are allowed for this Agreement. If there is any change in this Agreement, we will inform you via email or via the product's official website (http://home.mi.com). If you continue using this product after the notice about the change, it will be considered that you have understood the change and agree to accept the related terms. 5.1.2 Xiaomi reserves the right to modify, reserve or terminate any service at any time without notice. 5.1.3 You have agreed that Xiaomi will not be held liable to you or any third party for the modification, retention, or termination of this product. 5.2 Termination 5.2.1 This Agreement takes effect from the date of your acceptance, and will remain effective until the termination of this Agreement; 5.2.2 Despite foregoing regulations, if you use this product before you accept the Agreement, the Agreement will take effect from the moment you have started using the product, unless it is terminated according to the Agreement. 5.2.3 We may, according to the provisions of the law, revoke your right to use this product or your account rights. Whether we inform you or not, we may terminate this Agreement at any time for any reason, including the situations when we think that you violated the any terms or conditions of this Agreement without intending to do so. 5.2.4 Without being subject to the revisions of the preceding paragraph, if the user has infringed the copyright of the third party or the notice from the legal agent of the copyright owners, Xiaomi reserves the right to terminate this Agreement; 5.2.5 Once this Agreement has been terminated, your user rights of this product will be terminated. Be aware that the termination means your user content will be deleted from our databases. Xiaomi will not be held liable for the termination of this Agreement including the termination and removal of your user account.
6. Third parties 6.1 You already acknowledge and agree that a part of our services is being conducted with the support of third parties. You are already aware that this Agreement is between you and Xiaomi, and not between you and third parties mentioned above. Xiaomi is the only party which can deal with the content, maintenance, support services, guarantees and related legal disputes concerning the product. You have agreed to comply with the Agreement and authorize this product to restrict your use of the product's services. 6.2 Third party information and services 6.2.1 A part of information and services in this product are provided by third partyies. Xiaomi does not control and is not responsible for the information and services of the third parties. 6.2.2 Xiaomi provides such information and services for your convenience or following the requirements of the third party. 6.2.3 The user shall bear all the risks related to using third party information and services. 6.2.4 When users get access to the third party information and services, they are subject to the third party's terms and policies. 6.3 Other users 6.3.1 This product contains user content offered by other users. This product does not control or assume legal responsibility for the user content. This product is not obliged to check, monitor, examine, approve, promise or guarantee user content. You must bear the legal responsibility for the risks related to using user content and interacting with other users. 6.3.2 Interaction with other users is the relationship between you and other users. This product does not assume any legal liability for such behavior. You have agreed that this product does not assume any legal responsibility for such interactions.
7. Compensation 7.1 You have agreed to use this product in a harmless way to avoid any complaints, litigation, loss, damage, liability, costs and expenses (including attorney fees) from third parties for the following items. 7.1.1 Your behavior while using this product. 7.1.2 User content. 7.1.3 User’s violation of this Agreement. 7.2 Xiaomi reserves the right of exclusive defense and claim for compensation. 7.3 Unless you have received written consent from Xiaomi, you agree that you shall not unilaterally settle with a third party in a legal dispute with Xiaomi. 7.4 Xiaomi will make every effort to inform you of such litigation, litigation behaviors, or processes. 7.5 This product does not under any circumstances assume any responsibility for you or any third party being damaged indirectly, consequentially, punitively, incidentally, or otherwise. The risk of damage to a computer system or mobile communications equipment caused by accessing and using this product will be borne by you personally.
8. Disclaimer 8.1 If the following situations occur, we do not assume any legal responsibility: 8.1.1 Your personal information shall be provided according to the laws and regulations or the requirements of the relevant government structures. 8.1.2 Information leak due to any improper use by the user. 8.1.3 Service interruptions, blockage and other situations which do not meet the requirements of the user due to a hacker attack, computer virus invasion, illegal content, shielding of harassing information, government control, and problems relating to technology or communication channels, and other network information security management. 8.1.4 Damage caused by communication channel errors, technical problems, network or computer errors, instability and force majeure. 8.1.5 Using this product may incur risks caused by anonymous or pseudonymous threats, defamation, offensive behavior, or generation of illegal content. 8.1.6 It is clearly stated that we will not guarantee the promptness, security, or accuracy of the product explicitly, implicitly or in any other form.
9. Privacy Policy The \"Mi Home Privacy Policy\" is part of this Agreement which you can find in the last part of this article. Read carefully all the articles of the Privacy Policy.
10. Notice 10.1 Users must provide their Mi Account associated with a recent valid email address. We will not assume any responsibility if your email address cannot be used or for other reasons why we cannot reach you. 10.2 All notices released by the product and the emails containing such notices are considered valid notices.
11. Applicable law 11.1 This Agreement applies to the law of the People's Republic of China. 11.2 In the event of a dispute, the relevant parties should try to settle the problem based on the principle of amicable consultation. If no settlement can be reached, the relevant parties must submit their case to the local court where Xiaomi is based.
12. Independence Some of the clauses in this Agreement are not applicable. Other provisions of this agreement continue to apply, and non-applicable terms and conditions will be modified in order to comply with the law.
13. Completeness 13.1 This Agreement (including the Privacy Policy) is the final, complete and exclusive agreement between you and Xiaomi. In addition, the Agreement supersedes the discussions and agreements of the parties concerned about such matters (including previous end user licenses, Terms of Service, and Privacy Policies). 13.2 The title of each segment is provided for information purposes only and contains no legal or contractual obligations. 13.3 Unless written consent has been given by Xiaomi, you may not transfer the rights and obligations specified in this Agreement. Any violation of the above-mentioned rules or attempts to transfer will be in vain.
Mi Home Privacy Policy You can use our services in a variety of different ways, such as by logging into Xiaomi's official website to buy Mi smart devices, and by using Mi Home software and services in different terminals. If you share with us the information (for example, by creating a Mi account), we can provide you with a wider range of services, such as product updates, more accurate advertising, content sharing, and community services. According to this, we will explain to you how we collect and use information, and how you can protect your privacy. Our privacy policies include the following issues: The information we collect. How we collect and use information. How you provide this information selectively, and how to access and update information. Sharing and security of information and range of applications and revision of Privacy Policy.
The information we collect We collect two types of information: personal information (personal information is the only information which can be used to identify or contact someone) and non-personal information (i.e. the information which is not directly associated with any particular person). If we combine the personal information and non-personal information, this information will be treated as personal information.
How we collect and use information
Collection and use of personal information When you interact with Xiaomi Communication Technology Co., Ltd. (\"Xiaomi\" or \"we\") and its associated companies, you may be asked to provide basic personal information to use our basic product services. The personal information may be combined with other information in order to improve our products and services. Below is the type of personal information Xiaomi may collect and some examples of how we use the information.
Collection of personal information When you create a Mi Account, download and update Xiaomi software, register at a Xiaomi website, and participate in online surveys or in other interactions with Xiaomi, we will ask you to provide personal information, including but not limited to your name, phone number, email address, postal address, etc. When you buy Xiaomi products and services, we will collect personal information, including but not limited to: delivery details, bank accounts, credit card details, billing addresses, credit checks, other financial information, as well as the records of contact and communication, etc. When you use a Xiaomi product to share your content with family and friends, send messages or products, invite others onto the Xiaomi BBS, Xiaomi will collect personal information which is relevant to the above-mentioned people, such as name, mailing address, E-mail address and telephone number. When you first use and activate your Mi device, your mobile device identification information, your device’s IMEI, and the approximate geographic location of your device will be sent to Mi Home. The above information collection could also apply when updating and restoring the factory settings.
Use of personal information Xiaomi will use your information strictly according to this Privacy Policy and its updated versions. Your personal information will only be used for purposes which have been confirmed and agreed upon. If we use the information for other purposes, we will ask for your consent in advance. The personal information we collect will be used to provide you with Xiaomi's products and services, processing your order or performing a contract between you and Xiaomi to ensure the function and security of our products and services, verify your identity, prevent and investigate fraud or other improper use. The personal information we collect will be used for the development of our products and services. However in general, we only use comprehensive and statistical information for this purpose. The personal information we collect will be used to communicate with you, for example, about updates of products or services. We will inform you immediately after the news is released. The personal information we collected will be used for the customized design of the products and for providing you with a more customized service. For example: recommend and display content and advertisements designed only for you or for research. If you participate in Xiaomi's lucky draw, competitions or similar promotional activities, the personal information you provide will be used to manage this kind of activity. Regarding your mobile device identification information, only the identification number of your mobile device can be used to activate your warranty services and specific software license, and we may invite you to participate in the survey. We may also use this information to improve our products and analyze the efficiency of our business operations. Nevertheless, we will not use this information to track your location. Collection and use of non personal information Meanwhile, in order to operate and improve Xiaomi's technology and services, Xiaomi will collect your personal information automatically. This will help Xiaomi provide you with a better user experience and improve service quality. Collection of non-personal information When you create a Mi account, download and update Xiaomi software, register at a Xiaomi website and participate in an online survey or in other interactions with Xiaomi, we will collect your information such as language, ZIP code, area code, and the time zone where you use Xiaomi products. Regarding information relating to the user habits and problems found when using the Mi Home app, we will, if required, collect anonymous statistics of how you use the Internet to provide you with a better online experience. In addition, when the Mi Home system is in an abnormal state or crashes, we may collect some information such as the device ID, the Internet protocol address and route data packets in order to determine the root of the problem. Regarding cookies and other technology used to collect information, the Xiaomi website, online services, interactive application software, email messages and advertising may use cookies and other technologies such as pixel tags and web beacons to collect and store your personal information. Log information - when you access Mi Home, our server will automatically record some log information. This kind of server log information may include the following details: IP address, browser types, browser languages, referral source page, operating system, date/time mark and clickstream data. Use of non-personal information The non-personal information we collect such as professions, languages, ZIP codes, area codes and the time zone where you use your Xiaomi product can help us better understand user behaviors so as to improve our products, services, and advertising campaigns. We can use statistics obtained from the \"User Experience Program\" to continuously improve the operating experience, running performance, repair problems and function design improvement. The information we collected from cookies and other technologies (such as pixel tags) can bring you a better user experience, and improve our overall service quality. For example, by saving your language preferences, we can show our services in your preferred language. We can use pixel marks to send emails in readable format to users, and we will be informed whether the email is open. We can use such information for reducing the emails sent to users or stop sending emails. How do users provide information selectively? Everyone has a different focus on privacy. Based on this, we will clearly indicate the way we collect information for you to choose the way you provide information. You are free to decide whether to join the \"User Experience Program\", i.e. you can exit the plan by switching off the \"User Experience Program\" option. You can modify the location of your device, for example: change or disable the positioning method or positioning server, modify the accuracy of the location information to change the location information provided to Xiaomi. You can modify your browser settings to reject or accept the cookies according to your own needs. You can also delete it from your storage devices at any time, or make it notify you when you write the cookies.n Access and update of personal information By clicking [https://account.xiaomi.com] to sign in to your account, you will be able to access and update your personal information. You can also delete part of your personal information or ask us to remove your personal account, unless we have to keep the information for legal reasons. Whenever you use our service, we strive to give you access to your personal information. If the information is incorrect, we will try to make you update or delete the information quickly via various means (unless we have to keep this information for legitimate business or legal reasons). When you update your personal information, we may ask you to verify your identity first, and then process your request. We may decline requests which have endless repetition, require too much technology input, risk the privacy of others, or are very unrealistic. As long as we can allow you to access and modify the information, and it does not need too much input, we will provide the service free of charge. We strive to protect our service from accidental or malicious damage. Therefore, when you delete the information from our service, we may not immediately delete the residual copies of the information from the server in use. Therefore the corresponding information stored on the backup system may not be deleted immediately. Share information with third parties Unless this Privacy Policy includes limited sharing policies, we will keep your personal information confidential and will not share your personal information with any third parties. With your authorization, we will share your personal information with third parties without your approval in the following situations: We will share personal information with third parties because of legal investigation, litigation, compulsory execution or other legal compulsory provisions or requirements. We will provide personal information to our subsidiaries, affiliates, or other trustworthy enterprises or individuals to help us process the personal information on our behalf. We require the above parties to agree to process the personal information according to our terms, privacy policies and any other applicable confidentiality and safety measures. If we restructure, merge or sell, we will, according to current privacy policy constraints keep all personal information we collect confidential and notify all affected users before we transfer the information. We may share the summarized non-personal information reasonably with the public and our partners for business purposes or for protecting the users, for example, when showing overall trends relating to our products and services. Information safety We strive to protect Xiaomi users from their information being unlawfully accessed, manipulated, disclosed or destroyed. To do this, the following special measures are in place: We encrypt many services by using SSL. We will review information collection, storage and processing (including physical security measures) in order to protect various systems from unauthorized access. We only allow Xiaomi staff and authorized personnel to work on behalf of service companies to access personal information, and they must strictly respect the confidentiality terms of the contract. If they fail to perform these obligations, they may be investigated for legal responsibility according to the law, or their working relationship with Xiaomi may be terminated. For us, the safety of your information is very important. Therefore, we will continue to make every effort to ensure the security of your personal information, and we will use storage and comprehensive transmission encryption methods to protect your information from unauthorized access, use or disclosure. Specific encrypted data can only be accessed by the users themselves. Application scope of Privacy Policy Our Privacy Policy does not apply to third party products and/or services. Mi Home products and services may contain third party products and services. When you use a third party product or receive a third party service, they may acquire your information. Therefore, we are here to remind you to read carefully the privacy policies of the third parties concerned. Meanwhile, this Privacy Policy does not apply to the data collection from external websites after clicking the link. Collection and use of personal information of children We recommend that children under 13 use Xiaomi products or services with the permission and guidance of their guardians. Xiaomi will not collect children's personal information when it is aware that they are children and will not disclose personal information to any third parties. Guardians have the right to refuse Xiaomi and its affiliates to further collect personal information of minors or ask Xiaomi and its affiliates to delete the personal information of minors. If we find we have collected personal information of children under 13, we will delete this information as soon as possible. Revision of Privacy Policy Privacy Policy may be revised. Without your express consent, we will not rescind the rights you enjoy according to this privacy policy, unless we send you notice via the email address you provided to us or if we have made a public announcement on our website. "

White is pure, simple, and elegant. White gives you a feeling of brightness and vigor, and takes you away from the daily routine.
Pink is the color of romance and fantasy. It fills your world with dreams, and takes you to the place where you find love and joy.
Yellow makes your eyes sparkle. Just like sunshine, it gives a promise of a wonderful time. Time, when darkness is gone.
Purple is the color of strong feelings. People who like purple are elegant and self-conscious, and have a good eye for beauty.
"Safe voltage range is 100~240 V. Don't use it on brightness adjustable lamp base."
Name can contain up to 4 characters
